column5: The correlation between macroeconomics, banking, international finance and financial markets is explored throughout this course, giving you a deep insight and advanced knowledge of the wider world of global business and international finance and financial markets.Triple Crown accreditation from AACSB, AMBA and EQUIS#4 most targeted university of top UK employers (High Fliers Research 2022)We train our students for careers as economists or managers in commerce, industry, banking, financial services or the public sector. This programme aims to equip you with a range of methodological and problem-solving skills and specialised knowledge relevant for international money and banking.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
